ing: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
des: "A basic chicken salad recipe with red bell peppers and feta cheese. Try using tomato-basil feta for added flavor!"
ins: In a serving bowl, mix together the chicken, celery, and red onion. In a separate bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, sour cream, feta cheese, and dill. Pour over the chicken mixture, and stir to blend. Taste, and season with salt and pepper as needed. Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
